page.title: 03Law and Order
page.content: Three local schools have been broken into recently: kingdown,Tilshead and Codford. At kingdown about five hundred pounds was stolen and type writers and computers were vandalized. At Tilshead the thieves couldn't find anything so they sprayed paint over everything.At Codford they broke five locks and one window.Â£1.76 was stolen and 3 meat pies. We think they were looking for the new computer but the headteacher had taken it home for the holidays. In Stockton an old lady was robbed when a man said he was from the council and she let him in. Later on she caught him taking things out of her drawers and he got out of window . The Lodge in Codford was broken into . Ornaments and money were taken.
